items.name: Coyote
items.summary: Highly adaptable canine whose haunting howls echo across the desert at dusk.

items.name: Javelina
items.summary: Pig-like mammals that travel in family groups, foraging for desert plants.

items.name: Gila Monster
items.summary: North America's only venomous lizard, covered in distinctive beaded scales.

items.name: Great Blue Heron
items.summary: Majestic wading bird standing over 4 feet tall, often seen hunting along the lakeshore.

items.name: Bald Eagle
items.summary: America's national symbol nests year-round at Roosevelt Lake.
